name: Obsidian ADO Plugin
description:
A plugin for Obsidian to manage epics and features in Azure DevOps.

Features:
- Manage Epics: Create, update, and delete epics in Azure DevOps.
- Manage Features: Create, update, and delete features associated with epics.
- User Settings: Customize plugin settings through a dedicated settings tab.

Configuration:
- Set your Azure DevOps Personal Access Token, Organization URL, and refresh interval in the plugin settings tab after enabling the plugin.
- Access plugin features from the command palette or ribbon icons.
- Settings are saved automatically.
author: Jared C likes
